attributes.action: Reverse the proposed petrol and diesel ban for new cars and vans.
attributes.additional_details: It is a direct attack on our freedom of choice, it will affect millions of people’s everyday life, it will take away lots of people’s enjoyment of motoring and driving, it will destroy millions of jobs in the automotive industry, and it will be devastating to the economy.
attributes.background: Stop the petrol and diesel ban for new cars and vans due to come in in 2030

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585139
